amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to provide for the repeal of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010 and to encourage patient-centered reforms to improve health outcomes and reduce health care costs, promoting economic growth.

action.text: Amendment SA 202 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Cruz.

vote.text: Amendment SA 202 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 51.
